website_summaries.verdict: A granite grill top for patient, precise cooking and easy cleanup.
pros: Granite cooking tops take longer to heat than metal ones, but the even distribution of heat and versatility are often worth it
The smooth granite surface is extremely durable and easy to clean as well
Includes 8 spatulas and raclette pans, the latter of which wear stay-cool handles
cons: Is rated for 8 people, but users say it’s better suited for groups of to 3 to 4

customer_reviews.title: Swissmar made in China
customer_reviews.text: We had a swissmar Raclette grill for over 10 years and it was time to replace it with a newer version. We were eager to receive the new grill but unfortunately after opening he box, we realized the craftsmanship of the new model was not near as good as the older one. For example, the grill pans in the old model were very sturdy and well-made where as in the newer model (square shaped) they are very thin and flimsy. In addition, the older model was much cheaper in price than the newer version but the quality of the older model was much better.
customer_reviews.author: Idealtutor

customer_reviews.title: Great concept , lacking in how to manage the cooking oils , and or cooking juice from meat
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the cast aluminum cooktop separate, as I thought it came all in one package , with the granite top . $60 for the cast aluminum cooktop . So far works great with the granite top the cooking oils , or fat goes everywhere, there is no drip pan quite messy The cast aluminum holds all the cooking oils , until it overflows also , ? So in my opinion because of the lack of any type of drip pan, I can only hope the quality holds up on the heat coil itself
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Great evening dinner!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! The individual pans that melt the cheese are a little on the flimsy side. I recommend the granite top. It isn’t that difficult to clean and it heats nicely and cooks food better and more evenly than the Teflon tops (I’ve used both). I have the eight person, which is really only useful for 4-5 folks, as the top grill becomes too crowded. I wish the cord was longer. We have to use an extension cord, which looks tacky. It makes for a fun winter evening as we spend hours “cooking” around it with family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: KD Roach

customer_reviews.title: We love it! Granite darkens with use - but YOLO!
customer_reviews.text: We are obsessed. Granite darkens with use and is impossible to clean; we decided YOLO! Have mostly used it with raclette cheese and traditional raclette, but the other day did mexican-ish style -- had rice and beans and salsa on the side + cabbage and carrot type slaw... melted sharp cheddar and cooked diced zuchini and red pepper on top + little chorizo sausages. Super yummy.
customer_reviews.author: Anadroj Esor

customer_reviews.title: Prep foods ahead for ease.
customer_reviews.text: Great way to have dinner with a group. Everyone gets to cook their food to their own liking. Have tried it a few times and can tell you it is best to prep your food ahead by cutting meats and veggies into small, thin slices. I ordered the cookbook as well, and you will see that just about anything serves as a good raclette food. Favorite part? Provides an opportunity for everyone to talk and take part in the entire dinner experience.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Great for guests and fun to use, clean up is fairly easy once granite cools down.
customer_reviews.text: This brand and model was recommended by our neighbors who are european and invited us over for racklette one evening. I love the granite top and the silicon trays for the cheese are so easy to clean. It does heat up easily and is fun to use at home especially when you have guests over. My only complaint would be that there is no on/off button. You plug it in and it immediately gets warm so be careful not to burn yourself. There is a temperature adjustment knob on one side though.
customer_reviews.author: hchou

customer_reviews.title: Raclette is on the menu
customer_reviews.text: Awesomeness! Haven’t used yet - we needed a refresher with our Swiss friends who have the same brand with a metal grill. They insisted the stone is far superior and is what actual Swiss people buy nowadays. Yes it comes with the little spatulas.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Ok product stains easily
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an anniversary gift. We have used these before and wanted one for our own kitchen. We were really excited to use it. We used it one time and the stone was stained brown. It was not as easily cleaned as I was expecting. The heat has to be all the way on high for the stone to work. It is a nice product but would have liked the quality a little more durable.
customer_reviews.author: J All

customer_reviews.title: Super fun and tasty!
customer_reviews.text: My family loves this! It’s a lot of fun but this is only easy for 4 people and barely. My family of 5 could use a bigger one. Especially with kids who want to have more on the grill at one time but sharing space for 5 is tough on this thing. That being said, it forces us to slow down and enjoy dinner which this dad loves!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Lentz

customer_reviews.title: Gets really hot really fast which is great!
customer_reviews.text: We love our Raclette grill. We use it often throughout the winter with friends. What we like most about it is that the stone gets really hot! We had a different model before and our meat never really got grilled. This Swissmar brand grill is great.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: for Korean BBQ lover!
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!! this is awesome!!!! i can have korean BBQ in my house now. I saw this in my sister in laws house, I want it immediately! All i see is bulgogi on top of that stone. I ordered this raclette the same night and can't wait to try it the same day I got this!!! The stone doesn't heat up fast, but once it heats up(20mins), is very consistence.
customer_reviews.author: JOYCE

customer_reviews.title: Granite cracked already and customer service is very poor
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. However, the granite is cracked after only 2 months of use. I was very careful with it, and it appears as though it was cracked from the beginning. After contacting customer service 3 times, I have still received no feedback what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: mrdavey

customer_reviews.title: Must have for the winter
customer_reviews.text: We bought this Raclette stove for the long winter nights and long dinners with our friends. Very convenient is top granite stone for grilling meat, fish, chicken or vegetables. Heat control is accurate and once going it is a great party tool.
customer_reviews.author: Theor

customer_reviews.title: Smooth steady heat adds value
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a Swiss-Mar raclette for about twenty years. Over time, I lost or damaged several heating trays. While shopping ffor replacementsI came across the granite-topped version, and based on reviews, decided to give it a try.After a few trials, I am very glad I bought it. I prefer the slower steady heat of the granite over the Teflon and steel version, though both are great. I would recommend this unit to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Radmonkeyboy

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for Christmas for our very artsy son. He used it for the first time last night and loved it! He made fish tacos with all the trimmings! Definitely a great gift idea!
customer_reviews.author: Nanay

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for hosting guests
customer_reviews.text: We’ve enjoyed this set with many guests - great European dining experience. The kids enjoy it - just have to remember it’s hot! Highly recommend getting this
customer_reviews.author: Wingnut

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Party Essential - The stone hot plate is legit
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Party Essential - The stone hot plate is legit. Pros - The 8 personal pans are coated with anti-stick material and food slides off nicely. The heat takes some time to build up, but once the Swissmar gets going your food warms up quickly. So far, I've cooked shrimp, thin slices of beef/bacon, cheeses and veggies. Everything cooks well on this Raclette. Cons - The cord is way too short and of a low quality. I had to return my original ordered Swissmar Raclette because I used an extension cable in order to connect to the wall while placing the Raclette on the table, and the end of the cord got very hot and the cord broke.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: A very nice appliance, plus suggestion for protecting the cheese trays
customer_reviews.text: Very good looking, and works very well. The granite looks really nice for a party, but it's heavy, so if you are planning to take it with you to parties, the lighter griddle version could be better. I was concerned about protecting the cheese trays and purchased 3 x 4 in muslin gift bags to cover them during storage. The bags fit perfectly and the 10 provided handle the 8 cheese trays, with the other two for the scrapers. The listing says they are 4 x 6 but they are not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: made great food and great times
customer_reviews.text: This worked out well. My family got together and used it it was very nice. You may need to oil it more than it says as food starts sticking to it fairly quickly which is a bummer when you make salmon or some other flaky fish on it but we will try that next time.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Party!
customer_reviews.text: Great for a party. The stone is really pretty. Use salt before you grill on it. It could be hotter and cook faster but the whole point of it is to gather around and enjoy cooking together. The stone can be a little tough to clean up after cooking red meat. It does stain and that's ok. This us a great gift for a person that loves to host parties and doesn't want to be stuck in the kitchen the whole time.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: My kitchen essential
customer_reviews.text: Well... I didn't expect that much but it became our essential kitchen gadget and my daughter's favorite from the day 1 we used it. It is great and just needs some heat up time.
customer_reviews.author: Chan Lee

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I did a little research and bought a Swillmar because it seemed to be the best. We have had a blast introducing friends to Raclette while Glamping.
customer_reviews.author: Gary R. Bressler

customer_reviews.title: Love raclette
customer_reviews.text: Having lived in France, we love to do raclette fairly regularly. I have used several versions. The stone versions takes a long time to heat but stays hot and "cooks" fine. But likewise, takes awhile to cool off. Not sure I would buy another one. Plus mine has developed a crack on the bottom so not sure how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: W. Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Works well and Raclette is just the best :)
customer_reviews.text: Heats well, looks beautiful, works as intended (we didn't get a manual with it, but I think that's not a biggie :) )
customer_reviews.author: Maja

customer_reviews.title: Quality so so but still good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product but I have been disappointed with one of the raclette dishes bubbled. I did not want ask for warranty. I just bought a set of 2 additional ones.... Just a bit disappointed by the quality but still ok. It heats very well and looks nice
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas CC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I had read reviews on the Swissmar raclette, and the pros and cons of the granite top. I am so glad I chose Swissmar and I love the granite! It heats up well in a short period of time (no need to put it in the oven first to preheat as some had said). It cooks evenly and maintains the heat well. It's very easy to clean and looks great too! Awesome choice!
customer_reviews.author: BoiseBell

customer_reviews.title: power information
customer_reviews.text: Hi, we bought this raclette grill and just received it. It says 1200W, though description initially said 1000-1500W adjustable, which is why we chose it. Why this discrepancy? We want to get grilled cheese, not just melted. Will it be powerful enough?
customer_reviews.author: Valérie Faury

customer_reviews.title: ... bought one of these a few years back and love it. I have a real large family and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these a few years back and love it. I have a real large family and sometimes of a group of friends over so I bought another one so we wouldn't have to stretch across the table to reach the food when there are 10 of us around the table.It's so much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great product! It heated evenly and the meat didn’t ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It heated evenly and the meat didn’t take long on the slab. It was just as expected and would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: CherWell

customer_reviews.title: Like Having an Authentic Raclette Dinner!
customer_reviews.text: Raclette in NYC is one of my favorite restaurants. We wanted to re-create our favorite meal in Chicago and with this machine, we did! Not only does it work really well, but it is pretty! I don't even mind keeping it out on the counter!
customer_reviews.author: laurie

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but quality could be better for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and looks great. Works as expected. The handles of the aluminum handles bend easily which I do not like and did not expect for the price...the granite plate stains quickly after only one time use.
customer_reviews.author: Mareike Schaum

customer_reviews.title: Quality and fun
customer_reviews.text: Takes me back to raclette days in Switzerland. Love the stone top. Everything is quality material and seems like it will last a good long while
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Loved this!!
customer_reviews.text: Easiest way to have a relaxing meal. Everyone cook for themselves on one pan. Lots of fun making different Recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This one has the proper power for the US and works great! I am turning every one I know on ...
customer_reviews.text: I have Raclette every time I am in Germany and decided that I needed to have it in America. This one has the proper power for the US and works great! I am turning every one I know on to Raclette!
customer_reviews.author: niki Skistimas

customer_reviews.title: Love our raclette for entertaining
customer_reviews.text: We love this raclette grill, and are going to get a second one. The stone top cooks beautifully, the groove at the edge catches the juices well, and it cleans up easily. The same as Philly Rob, I would also recommend ordering one for every 4 people when entertaining. If you want people to be able to cook their own food, it gets pretty tight fitting 8 people around this.
customer_reviews.author: T. Karl

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and handy for 8 persons. Heating is a bit slow at 110 volts (I also live in France where I have 220 volt raclette devices).
customer_reviews.author: Greg M

customer_reviews.title: I love my Raclette!
customer_reviews.text: Love this grill! Glad I went with the granite stone top.
customer_reviews.author: Sounds

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for entertaining.
customer_reviews.text: Have had one of these for years and it’s still going strong. Decided to buy two more for Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: We love it just for the two of us too
customer_reviews.text: We had one already and had to order a second for a large party. We love it just for the two of us too. The stone top cleans easy and just makes it feel like a party!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Not just for company
customer_reviews.text: It's not just for parties but what fun with guests, I come home from a busy day and together with my family just relax over a great dinner and unwind with great conversation
customer_reviews.author: mimi

customer_reviews.title: This Grill is wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I love raclette and have not used one of these for many years, but after having a raclette dinner at a friends it reminded me that I shold get one of these! Our kids love raclette night, shrimps on this are just lovely and fresh vegetables, brussel sprouts etc... Great buy and a lot of fun entertaining!
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic. The kids loved it
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. The kids loved it. The ones who don't eat anything were seen cooking onions and mushrooms and excitedly comparing results. The grownups loved it. It was a huge success for a party and a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Monique M.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but had to return due to the crack in the stone. Haven't purchased the other one yet.
customer_reviews.author: YuliaV

customer_reviews.title: heat not strong enough
customer_reviews.text: Nice look - Didn't get hot enough .... It takes long time before cheese melts
customer_reviews.author: Jerome

customer_reviews.title: Love my raclette grill
customer_reviews.text: Totatlly recommend this grill. We have had loads of family and friend fun time with our new grill. Easy to use, easy to clean. Considering buying another one so we can have more people over.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Stone heated up beautifully.
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well at our Raclette party. Stone heated up beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a easter dinner with 8 people
customer_reviews.text: just what I wanted. Perfect for a easter dinner with 8 people.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Anderson

customer_reviews.title: and each time we were very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for my girlfriend, and she loves it! We have used it a few times since purchase, and each time we were very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Fortes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Holds up and easy to clean. Fun for get togethers with friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Hammer78

customer_reviews.title: Wedding gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a wedding gift for my daughter and her husband and purchased because they were married in St Moritz Switzerland. They used at a small dinner party and were thrilled with it as well as their guests.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We had a great time cooking and enjoying our dinner
customer_reviews.text: We had a great time cooking and enjoying our dinner. Worked wonderful! Plenty of room on grill top and underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the marble top
customer_reviews.text: I like the marble top, but I wish that I had picked up the grill top. I don't like how the marble top stains.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Took a flier on a Xmas gift for my wife......
customer_reviews.text: .....and wound up pleasantly pleased. We like social dinners. Korean BBQ. Hot pot. Fondu. Has seen devices like this when traveling outside the US but had no experience. So took a chance here and was very pleased. My wife loved the gift. It worked as described. The design is well done. We have enjoyed a few meals already and will continue to use the Raclette grill for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Greg P

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for Americans Abroad
customer_reviews.text: My American Family LOVED this as a gift that let them a German and Swiss way of cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy in Germania

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace a gift received for mother's day that was stolen by a renter summer 2015
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: This product is outstanding. We thoroughly enjoy using it and it cleans up pretty easily. Only downside is that while it serves up to 8 people, 8 people can't comfortably sit around the same unit. My guess is we'll be purchasing another one if we think we'll use it for larger groups. Great, fun product. Seems to make the food even taste better!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: This is a great appareil raclette
customer_reviews.text: This is a great appareil raclette! Only drawback is that the granite turned a little brown where I cooked meat, but that's to be expected. It does take awhile for the granite to cool down.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: Novice Raclette Owner
customer_reviews.text: Pros -Nice granite stone top -Cooks food well -8 trays for cheese -cheese doesn't stick to trays Cons -Clean up since not dishwasher safe had to handwash -Cramped for 8 people more comfortable with 5-6
customer_reviews.author: JAA

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's not a 8 person unit,it's more suitable for 4 maybe.
customer_reviews.author: John L Knoble

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: "Not too shabby" according to my British & Swiss friends who helped us break it in... In other words, we highly recommend this fantastic raclette machine.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife for Christmas. Granite top was worth the extra money. Heats up quickly and cooks evenly. The utinsels were easy to use and clean. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Schawang

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: We have had several parties already and everyone loved it! Avoid doing this in the summer though, definitely better for the cooler months of winter!
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie C. Franc

customer_reviews.title: but it turned out great and she loves it
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my GF who's had raclette in Switzerland so I was worried, but it turned out great and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Nino

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Gets real hot, real fast. Bought for my parents and it totally reminds the family of ski vacations. Man I love Raclette!
customer_reviews.author: J. Kolb

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Could'nt get brown spots off granite after first use, otherwise love it. Granite probably needs to get sealed, sticker would have been helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Roland Kolitsch

customer_reviews.title: Raclette Party Grill
customer_reviews.text: Nothing beats a raclette maker for a fun dinner party.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Fields

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: We love the raclette and have used it many times for dinner and entertaining. What a fun way to do dinner. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! So many fun combinations and experiments for the whole family!
customer_reviews.author: Keebs01

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! This grill is so much fun to do with a group. Works wonderfully
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking, But Didn't Get Hot Enough
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed by this product. It didn't get hot enough to cook anything in a reasonable amount of time. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Myrtle Beach Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great for a Party!
customer_reviews.text: We love this raclette maker, it is very versatile too which is fun. Great for a party of eight or even more. Beautifully made machine. 5 star all the way
customer_reviews.author: P. D. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Not what we ordered, but works just fine.
customer_reviews.text: The raclette grill we ordered is what is pictured here, but what was delivered has a cast iron top. It worked like a charm for cooking veggies and meat. The cheese melted in the pans underneath with no problem. Overall, we're very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Britta

customer_reviews.title: Great party addition
customer_reviews.text: We had a party and really enjoyed using this item. Everyone had a great time melting and combining their own eats!
customer_reviews.author: NWBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Classy, moderate price.
customer_reviews.text: Fun for a special meal, like fondue. Take your time. Have lots of items to cook, or just taste. Do it.
customer_reviews.author: Kert Reedstrom

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic conversation preserver...we talk around it!!
customer_reviews.text: I ABSOLUTELY love this but dropped the slab which broke into a million peices so I am desparate to purchase a new one...I use this weekly with my best friends and we miss it terribly please contact me as soon as possible
customer_reviews.author: G. BOWYER

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: As soon has we received our Raclette we opened and used it. We absolutely love it. We had another couple over for dinner and we had so much fun! I would highly recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works good, but there is no book with recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Rohrbert

customer_reviews.title: No FREE recipe book
customer_reviews.text: Great product, however, not a happy customer. Product description said a FREE recipe book included. I did not receive one.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Cupisz

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS FOR OUTDOOR/INDOOR ENTERTAINING
customer_reviews.text: Reminds me of the times when we would settle down for an entire evening of conversation around fondues for the appetizers, main dishes, and desserts. It's a great way of entertaining. Very easy cleanup afterwards. The reason I did not give it 5 stars was because it did NOT come with the 8 tongs required...now I must go shopping for them...thankfully, a neighbour offered her tongs for use at my first Raclette dinner. Also, I wish the cord was much longer and would prefer a cord that I could remove when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: A thin slice of eggplant will take upwards of 20 minutes to cook and that is only to a hot state not the partial golden brown mo
customer_reviews.text: The lower portion is OK it does what it is supposed to do; however, the top griddle does not get hot enough to cook with any persistence. A thin slice of eggplant will take upwards of 20 minutes to cook and that is only to a hot state not the partial golden brown most like. bacon or steak slices you can forget cooking on top as it will not do it. I am not a novice to Raclette usage as my family has this experience often.
customer_reviews.author: martin

customer_reviews.title: Works good. The bottom part where the little pans are ...
customer_reviews.text: Works good. The bottom part where the little pans are are not hot enough to actually cook meat or veggies (unless you want to wait 20 minutes ) .... but it is warm enough below there to melt cheese or so. Solution: Get the version with the granite top and use the pans to cook your food on top. That works great and less mess. It also prevents the mixing of flavors, as the granite top is just one big area. If one cooks fish, and someone else cooks meat.... flavors, juices will mix. Using the pans prevent this. Product works great, would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ron in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Relax, Have Dinner, And Get To Know Others
customer_reviews.text: If you want a casual evening with family or friends that gives time to enjoy one another's company and share a unique experience, this product is the answer. The intrigue of cooking your own dinner spans all ages - kids and adults love talking and eating...and eating and talking together! We now have two (I don't recommend more than 6 people per oven, as the cooking surface gets a little crowded), and when I pull these down from the shelf to setup for dinner, I always seem to have a smile.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Running

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: First off the stone is very small. I don't know how to entertain more than 3 people with this. Then when the cheese melted it kinda came out as a clump. The stone was hot, but very small. Expect to buy 2 of these if you have more than 3 guests
customer_reviews.author: Adventurer

customer_reviews.title: Party on!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my mom for mother's day. My folks entertain a lot and they have really enjoyed the raclette. Our company to whom we served Raclette often ask if we will serve it again. Lots of fun, we experiment with ldifferent types of food, not just the traditional raclette of potatoes and cheese, but fresh herbs, onions, peppers, meats, and various vegetables. Definitely recommend trying a variety of cheeses as well. Havarti, horseradish flavored, any melt-able soft white cheeses are wonderful, but basic cheddar is great if that is all you have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have no clue why my wife still has this
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I can't see what the whole point of this item is. I could just go my locate granite store and buy a hunk of stone put it over the fire and the results would be the same. I would not recommend this item to anyone as it does not serve any purpose what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We already purchased one in the past. Having two help us to host a larger group. Unique way of cooking
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my spouse for Christmas. They love it. Great value for the price, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous ! Very High Quality and A Great Value  from Swissmar  !
customer_reviews.text: I Love This High Quality Swissmar Granite Stone Raclette ! Gorgeous and Functional. Not only is this a gorgeous Raclette its also very high quality and alot of value for your money. This Raclette is just wonderful and I highly recommend it. I am very impressed ! Superb Quality and another wonderful Value from Swissmar...... Enjoy !
customer_reviews.author: George of North Merrick , N.Y.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grill. I love it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent grill. I love it. They said it's mostly used in Switzerland during winter months but I've been using it here in Vegas now when the temperature is more than 100 degrees F.
customer_reviews.author: Welina

customer_reviews.title: love the stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: Works well, love the stainless steel, cleans easily. One downside is that it's more like a 6 person grill, the little cheese pans are too close to each other and it makes it a total mess to have 8 people trying to reach their little pans.
customer_reviews.author: Maris

customer_reviews.title: Versitile and sturdy --
customer_reviews.text: this was my only cooking surface/appliance after a recent move for the duration of unpacking and organizing my kitchen. Love the granite surface. Easy cleanup. Veggies, meat, toasted bread, hash browns, fish filet, -- even fried eggs on top -- toasty cheese underneath!
customer_reviews.author: *Auntie L*

customer_reviews.title: Great choice buying this Raclette grill
customer_reviews.text: Great choice buying this Raclette grill. I looked at so many but in the end decided on this one with the granite stone. Have only used it for 4 people and would definitely look at a second one if I wanted to entertain with a higher number.
customer_reviews.author: emzbiz

customer_reviews.title: Better than I could have ever imagined
customer_reviews.text: Better than I could have ever imagined. So far we've only used it for KBBQ nights and it works like a dream. Heats up quickly and really easy to clean. Let it cool and wash the stone with warm soapy water. Easy peasy.
customer_reviews.author: KatCassidy

customer_reviews.title: Really fun, cool way to have a get together
customer_reviews.text: Really fun, cool way to have a get together. Only thing I didn’t care for was the food stuck easily to the stone.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Blacksmith

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Oh what fun, we even made dessert too. Just love the stone, my friend had us over for a grill at the table top dinner and I purchased mine that very night at her house. Great for fun entertaining dinner at your home.
customer_reviews.author: Terri C21

customer_reviews.title: Swiss German Cooking
customer_reviews.text: It is debated whether the raclette grill was developed in Switzerland or Germany. In any case it is a great table cooking devise to use whenever you have friends stop over for a quick easy snack. Very diverse in application and fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald M. Burkhart

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: We love it and the grandkids had the best time. Wish it were bigger, but we will order another.
customer_reviews.author: E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: It's exactly what I wanted and had seen in Switzerland
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to operate and easy to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: kisel

customer_reviews.title: Product works well and is fun to use around the table
customer_reviews.text: Product works well and is fun to use around the table. The only problem was the granite stained after the first use. More cosmetic than functional issue.
customer_reviews.author: Pork and Beans

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: high quality of all materials,the granite plank is beautifull, everybody in my family and friends like it, cooks even, the plates doesnt stick, just follow the instruccions for cleaning. Use your imagination for cooking. highly recomend it
customer_reviews.author: rosa

product_meta.title: Swissmar Stelvio 8 Person Stainless Steel Raclette with Granite Stone Top
product_meta.description: Memorable dinner parties are easy with this elegant stainless steel Swissmar Raclette with authentic Swiss style granite stone grill top. Perfect for grilling meats, seafood, veggies on top while melting your favorite cheeses in the individual raclette dishes underneath. Dishes may also be used to prepare and cook personalized dishes. Gift boxed with 8 heat-resistant spatulas and raclette dishes. Also included is a FREE Raclette Recipe Book. Hot stone, dishes and spatulas are dishwasher safe; wipe base unit with soft damp cloth and pat dry. Do not use steel wool, wire brushes or scouring detergents. Do not submerge base unit; do not use cooking sprays on grill top surface or raclette dishes. Product Built to North American Electrical Standards. Unless otherwise indicated, this product is manufactured for North American electrical standards and is intended for use in the United States and Canada.
feature_bullets: Cracks in the granite stone are normal and are caused by relief of tension during the heating process - they don't impair the function of grilling, therefore, cracks are excluded from the warranty

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
